event.descr: This notification is generated when one or more virtual servers are down.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcVIPDownThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Count of VIPs down =%parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when all virtual servers are up.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcVIPDownThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when real servers up threshold configuration is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: realServerUpThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value =%parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value =%parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when real servers up threshold configuration is satisfied
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: realServerUpThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when connection table current sessions threshold is breached.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcConnectionTableCountThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when connection table current sessions threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcConnectionTableCountThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC Control CPU Usage is breached for last 64 seconds.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcControlCPUStatusThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC Control CPU usage threshold is satisfied for last 64 seconds.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcControlCPUStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC DataCore CPU usage threshold is breached for last 64 seconds.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcDataCoreCPUStatusThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC DataCore CPU usage threshold is satisfied for last 64 seconds.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcDataCoreCPUStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when count of ADC DataCores exceeds threshold count for last 64 seconds.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcDataCoresExceedingThreshod trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold count = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current count = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when count of ADC DataCore satisfies the threshold count for last 64 seconds.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcDataCoresExceedingThreshodCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC Allocation Failure per NPU threshold is not satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcAllocationFailuresPerNPUThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Allocation Failures = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC Allocation Failure per NPU threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcAllocationFailuresPerNPUThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC Allocation Failure for DP threshold is not satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcAllocationFailuresPerDPThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% DP Number =%parm[dpNumber]% Allocation Failures = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ADC Allocation Failure for DP threshold is satisfied.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcAllocationFailuresPerDPThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% DP Number =%parm[dpNumber]% Allocation Failures = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ms interface is down.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcMSInterfaceStatusDownThreshold trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ms interface is up.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: adcMSInterfaceStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when Egress interface is up.

event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: tlbRINextHopIndexStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: realServerDownThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value =%parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value =%parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ms interface is up.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: tlbMSInterfaceStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when Egress interface is down.

event.descr: This notification is generated when CPU limit, Memory limit and Flow limit packet drops.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: cgnatPacketDropStatusThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when there is no CPU limit, Memory limit and Flow limit packet drops.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: cgnatPacketDropStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when memory status is breached
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: cgnatMemoryZoneStatusThreshold trap received Service Instance Name=%parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when memory status is Cleared
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: cgnatMemoryZoneStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when ports utilization threshold is breached.

event.descr: This notification is generated when when ports utilization threshold is satisfied

event.descr: This notification is generated when current port blocks in use equal to effective port blocks.

event.descr: This notification is generated when CPU limit, Memory limit and Flow limit packet drops.

event.descr: This notification is generated when service PIC is down.

event.descr: This notification is generated when service PIC is up.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: sfwServicePICStatusThresholdCleared trap received Service Instance Name= %parm[serviceName]% KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% service PIC Name =%parm[interfaceName]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgHAStatusThreshold
event.descr: This notification is generated when SDG HA status is changed.
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgHAStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]% status = %parm[sdgStatus]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgHAStatusThresholdCleared
event.descr: This notification is generated when SDG HA status is normal.
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgHAStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% status = %parm[sdgStatus]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgMasterBgpASPathStatusThreshold
event.descr: This notification is generated when master SDG routing instance BGP advertising AS path is greater than zero
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgMasterBgpASPathStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgMasterBgpASPathStatusThresholdCleared
event.descr: This notification is generated when master SDG routing instance BGP advertising AS path is zero.
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgMasterBgpASPathStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgStandbyBgpASPathStatusThreshold
event.descr: This notification is generated when standby SDG routing instance BGP advertising AS path is zero
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgStandbyBgpASPathStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgStandbyBgpASPathStatusThresholdCleared
event.descr: This notification is generated when standby SDG routing instance BGP advertising AS path is greater than zero.
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgStandbyBgpASPathStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgVRRPStatusThreshold
event.descr: This notification is generated when all MSP/DNS facing IRB interface is not VRRP master if SDG is master or is not VRRP backup if SDG is standby.
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgVRRPStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgVRRPStatusThresholdCleared
event.descr: This notification is generated when all MSP/DNS facing IRB interface is VRRP master if SDG is master or VRRP backup if SDG is standby.
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgVRRPStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgMasterCGNATStatefulSyncStatusThreshold
event.descr: This notification is generated when master SDG CGNAT stateful sync role is not active or connection is not up or synchronization is not hot.
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgMasterCGNATStatefulSyncStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when master SDG CGNAT stateful sync role is active or connection is up or synchronization is hot.
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgMasterCGNATStatefulSyncStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when standby SDG CGNAT stateful sync role is not backup or connection is not up or synchronization is not hot.
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgStandbyCGNATStatefulSyncStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when standby SDG CGNAT stateful sync role is backup or connection is up or synchronization is hot.
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgStandbyCGNATStatefulSyncStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgCGNATRouteStatusThreshold
event.descr: This notification is generated when CGNAT default route is status is not proper
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgCGNATRouteStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgCGNATRouteStatusThresholdCleared
event.descr: This notification is generated when CGNAT default route status status is proper.
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgCGNATRouteStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgADCVIPRouteStatusThreshold
event.descr: This notification is generated when all VIP's are not point to local ADC service pic
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgADCVIPRouteStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgADCVIPRouteStatusThresholdCleared
event.descr: This notification is generated when all VIP's are point to local ADC service pic
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgADCVIPRouteStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.event-label: User defined HA threshold event: sdgTLBRIDefaultRouteStatusThreshold
event.descr: This notification is generated when TLB routing instance default Route not point to Composite Next hop index
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgTLBRIDefaultRouteStatusThreshold trap received KPI Name = %parm[kpiName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when TLB routing instance default Route point to Composite Next hop index
event.logmsg: User defined HA threshold event: sdgTLBRIDefaultRouteStatusThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]%

event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: highThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when low threshold was exceeded.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: lowThresholdExceeded trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated low threshold was exceeded but dropped.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: lowThresholdCleared trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Threshold Value = %parm[thresholdValue]% Current Value = %parm[value]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when status of interface Down.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: statusThresholdDown trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]%

event.descr: This notification is generated when status of interface previously down has been restored.
event.logmsg: User defined threshold event: statusThresholdUp trap received KPI Name =%parm[kpiName]% Interface Name =%parm[interfaceName]%
